Reviews.Title: had for almost 2 years
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: i got my phone from t mobile.com, all i call tell you about this phone. is that it lasted me for 2 years. i put this phone into so much crap i didn't think it would still work today. i throw it at walls. felt out of my pants and hit the floor hard. and much more. i love Nokia for making good phone that last. but the software is crappe tho

Reviews.Title: Great PDA
Reviews.Author: Gilbert
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone, and the price it's wonderful. I love the E-Series, i had Nokia  E61i, E71, E63 and now this one Nokia E73...!!! i Loved the new shorcuts of the phone and the 5 Mp camera. I recomend this phone for the PDA Lovers

Reviews.Title: Value phone but Do Not buy from Wireless Expert
Reviews.Author: AKA lamb "AHTL"
Reviews.Content: Wireless Expert did not send you the OEM box and will take out the OEM micro SD, leather case, car charger, and even the wall charger!The phone have pretty good review ratings from cnet.com...Be caution (if you buy from Wireless Expert), you will have to pay S&H; back to even get a refund but that I will need to confirm further with my bank...

Reviews.Title: Great phone, hotspot, PDA-decent GPS
Reviews.Author: Kimme "Kimme"
Reviews.Content: Nokia has had some issues in the past few years-but this is a solid device and one of my favorite Nokia devices (I have used an E71, E61 and few other non smart phones).I really like the built in fm radio, and have mixed reaction to the media center on the phone-which takes some getting used to. I have never been able to get pre-loaded videos from the memory card to play on the phone, and I have tried a few different formats. The interface on the mp3 player mode is a little odd and takes some getting used to-however it does work well. The camera takes excellent pictures (5MP), and has an actual external flash. The phone takes decent videos as well, but the video sound quality is not great.Image heavy sites do not work well on this phone due to limited memory issues, so if you are trying to use non-mobile sites for most sites this may not be a great choice. This has nothing to do with the proprietary browser on the phone-I have tried using Opera mobile, and everything to do with system RAM. Sites like youtube will work, but only in the mobile version and it takes a while for it to load.The communication apps on this phone are solid. Google messenger, AIM and most of the pop3 email accounts and gmail work pretty well on this. Microsoft exchange also works well on this phone and has the Quick Office app that allows you edit MS documents and MS excel files-although the screen is small. Some of the older e-series devices were compatible with Blackberry connect-this one is not-and no ad I have seen makes this clear.While some reviewers have commented that the keyboard on the phone is a little small, it is a little on the small side compared to BB-but this makes it easier to operate from one hand. This phone also has the Nokia predictive text built in-which is odd on a phone with a qwerty keyboard but makes emailing a lot faster. The trackpad operates very well but is very sensitive, and the soft key/home keys are also easy to press with one hand. However, the main screen is not as customizable as other smart phone devices.Ovi maps is the GPS on the phone, and for the most part, it works well. What I really like about Ovi maps is the ability to download maps to the phone and use the maps/gps without a data connection. Google maps is still a downloadable file and it does work well.T-Mobile bloat wear is abundant on this phone-beware.I have been using my e73 for over a year-if you have any specific questions feel free to leave a comment and I can try to help!QUAD Band and t-mobile, europe, asia enabled (2100/900/1700).

Reviews.Title: It's a good phone
Reviews.Author: dw12345
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone,the battery work efficient ,and the wifi also work wonderful and it also support 3G work well

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my father, but I've been using it for a while just to check everything. It works great so far, and also shipped on time. I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: What amazing phone! I love it
Reviews.Author: Wayler S. Mora Salas
Reviews.Content: What amazing phone! I love it. It reads with voice my SMS's, it is easy to configure. I love that the audio jack is standard, so I could plug it to my car radio, so no need for free hands. The included auriculars are cool because they isolate the noise. Integration with Outlook is easy. The car charger works great. I definitely recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: I'd be upset if I had paid more than $25 for this
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: I got this for free from T-Mobile when I agreed to renew my contract. My previous phone was the Nokia 6301 (also from T-Mobile) and I loved it so much I wanted to get another Nokia. Boy was I disappointed!Good points- Solid construction- QWERTY keyboard for note taking and texting- Battery lasts a long while, especially when you activate the power savings feature- The back flashlight is very useful- Great for travel - unlike the Nokia 6301, this is quad band and automatically adjusts clock based on location.- Free visual voicemailBad points- Buggy - on my phone if you hit Menu, followed by Exit, you end up locking the keypad. Why does it do that? One night I was talking to someone while the phone was charging and I noticed that the screen showed no indication that a phone call was taking place. After the call ended, the only way I was able to turn off the phone was to remove the battery. Also the visual voicemail is buggy. It often mis-identifies the name of the caller who left the voicemail.- Unintuitive - it took me a long while to figure out where to go to set alarm clock. (in case you have the same question it is Menu > Applications > Clock)- Poor features - this is the first phone I owned that does not save call duration. During the phone call, there is a ticking clock that tells you how long you've been on but that information is lost after the call ends.Since I got this phone for free, I can't complain too much because I got what I paid for. ;)

Reviews.Title: Not an unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Unhappy in Haiti
Reviews.Content: This phone was listed as an unlocked phone. When I inserted a local SIM card here in Haiti I got the message that the SIM was invalid. I took it to a local cell phone dealer who told me the phone was an AT&T; phone and was locked. Be aware that this is not an unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: It was second hand, and NOT 100% unlocked
Reviews.Author: F. Claudia Leticia
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived with pictures taken by somebody, and I still cannot configure internet because it is not 100% unlocked.I am very disappointed, and already thinking of getting a Nokia E72, or save some money and get the Nokia N9.I trust Nokia, i love their phones, but this was not proper delivery.

Reviews.Title: shotty quality
Reviews.Author: welll
Reviews.Content: ordered the phone from  yellowdeals and it was great.2 weeks later, won't even turn oni currently have it in repair after mailing it to nokiawe'll see what they say about it, could be just a faulty battery

Reviews.Title: Good Nokia
Reviews.Author: HD
Reviews.Content: excellent phone.  It arrived on time, and the price was right.  The only fact that I did not know is that the charger is USB and not the regular Nokia charger, and this sometimes is a problem if there are other Nokias at home.

Reviews.Title: item was not unlock
Reviews.Author: Angella
Reviews.Content: I don't like dishonest people I purchase the phone and it said it was unlocked and it was not had to pay $50..00  us dollars go unlock in Jamaica so I would not recommend to buy unlocked items from you.

Reviews.Title: Bad seller the "new phone was damaged"
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: I had a bad experience buying this Nokia E73. First, the optical key(scroll) was damaged and it did not work when I wanted to take a photo or select an icon, even the optical key was on and correctly configured. Also, the user manual was hand written and it means that it was not new. Lastly, the seller only answered that they were sorry.

Reviews.Title: t
Reviews.Author: luis adrian
Reviews.Content: Tremendo telefono, se trata de una oficina para aquellas personas que tienen que cargar con una laptop, no les hara falta, viene completo, todo precargado facebok, tweter, msn, g mail. hotmail, entre otros y por ultimo tremendo precio, navega muy bien.

Reviews.Title: negative sign
Reviews.Author: Manas "manas"
Reviews.Content: this seller writing: mobile all unlocked and you can used with all operators but it was a lie. the mobile working only with t-mobile. he send me message with unlock code - but this code isn't correct. now ain't using this mobile, i bought new code and waiting when company send message to me, with correct code. so i cant testing this mobile because t-mobile don't working in this place. end.

Up to 13 hours of talk time, up to 528 hours (22 days) of standby time
